content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.04 > Section 82.04.350 82.04.340 << 82.04.350 >> 82.04.355 PDF RCW 82.04.350 Exemptions — Racing. Except as provided in RCW 82.04.286 (1), this chapter shall not apply to any person in respect to the business of conducting race meets for the conduct of which a license must be secured from the horse racing commission. [ 2005 c 369 s 7 ; 1961 c 15 s 82.04.350 . Prior: 1959 c 197 s 19 ; prior: 1945 c 249 s 2, part; 1943 c 156 s 4, part; 1941 c 178 s 6, part; 1939 c 225 s 5, part; 1937 c 227 s 4, part; 1935 c 180 s 11, part; Rem. Supp. 1945 s 8370-11, part.] NOTES: Findings — Intent — Severability — Effective date — 2005 c 369: See notes following RCW 41.05.750 .
